fields.label: Page Sections
fields.name: page_section
fields.instructions: Add multiple wrappers, sections and elements to your pages content.

sub_fields.name: wrapper_name
sub_fields.placeholder: Add a name to your wrapper so you can find it when collapsed

sub_fields.label: Section Elements
sub_fields.name: section_element
sub_fields.instructions: Add elements to your section. Click the "Section Options" tab above to stylize this section container.

sub_fields.label: Content Width
sub_fields.name: content_width
sub_fields.instructions: Width the Elements within the Section spans.

sub_fields.label: Content Constraint
sub_fields.name: content_constraint
sub_fields.instructions: Amount of inner constraint of the Elements within this Section.

sub_fields.label: Block Media Audio
sub_fields.name: block_media_audio
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an audio file (mp3 for browser compatibility).

sub_fields.label: Block Media Audio (copy)
sub_fields.name: block_media_audio_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an audio file (mp3 for browser compatibility).

sub_fields.label: Invert Text Color
sub_fields.name: invert_text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to invert text color for easier reading on dark backgrounds/images.

sub_fields.label: Testimonials
sub_fields.message: This element will render a single, random testimonial post. See elements/testimonials.php.

sub_fields.label: Board Members
sub_fields.message: This element will render a list of board members in page order. See elements/board_members.php.

sub_fields.label: Board Meetings
sub_fields.message: This element will render a list of board meetings and the attached documents. See elements/board_meetings.php.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Class
sub_fields.name: wrapper_class
sub_fields.instructions: Separate multiple classes with single space

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Width
sub_fields.name: background_width
sub_fields.instructions: Width this Wrapper spans.

sub_fields.label: Enable Jumbotron
sub_fields.name: enable_jumbotron
sub_fields.message: Enable jumbotron to scale element based on screen height as opposed to adding padding around the content of the element.

sub_fields.label: Jumbotron Scale
sub_fields.name: jumbotron_scale
sub_fields.instructions: Height of background in relation to screen height. Defaults to 100%.

sub_fields.label: Background Video
sub_fields.name: background_video
sub_fields.instructions:
Youtube Video ID. ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=
fIlJyZEbrzo

sub_fields.message: Select a background image to be used on mobile devices in place of the video background.

sub_fields.label: Opacity Amount
sub_fields.name: opacity_amount
sub_fields.instructions: Value ranges from 01 to 99. The higher the number, the more opaque the color overlay.

sub_fields.label: Down Arrow
sub_fields.name: down_arrow
sub_fields.message: When enabled, displays a "Down Arrow" at the bottom of the section prompting users to continue to scroll.

sub_fields.label: Enable Section
sub_fields.name: enable_section
sub_fields.instructions: Enabled by default. Use to show or hide a section.
